DOC.brief_summary: To validate the analgesic efficacy and safety of celecoxib compared with ibuprofen SR in the management of acute pain post orthopedic or gynecological surgery
DOC.brief_title: Compare Celecoxib and Ibuprofen Sr In The Management Of Acute Pain Post Orthopedic Or Gynecological Surgery
DOC.criteria: Undergone uncomplicated orthopedic surgery or abdominal gynecological surgery under epidural anesthesia Baseline pain intensity of more than 45 mm as measured by VAS and a severity of pain graded as moderate or severe on the categorical pain intensity scale A previous history of intolerance or hypersensitivity to any NSAIDs, cyclooxygenase inhibitor, sulfonamides, or any analgesic, or to drugs with similar chemical structures
